title: Craig Wright to Face New Allegations of Forgery in COPA Trial Over Ontier Emails
description: He's set to retake the stand on Friday to defend allegations initially made by his former lawyers that their correspondence submitted to court had been doctored.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s brother: ‘His life would be wasted in prison’
description:
The former FTX CEO’s mother, father, and brother all wrote letters to Judge Lewis Kaplan suggesting that SBF’s lack of social awareness could lead to problems in prison.

Lawyers for Sam “SBF” Bankman-Fried included 29 letters of support of clemency for the former FTX CEO as a federal judge prepares to decide his sentence, including recommendations from his immediate family.

In a Feb. 27 filing in United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, SBF’s lawyers attached letters from Barbara Fried, Joseph Bankman, and Gabriel Bankman-Fried — the former CEO’s mother, father, and brother, respectively. Perhaps predictably, all three asked for a light sentence for Bankman-Fried’s seven felony charges, delving into the 31-year-old’s childhood, personality, and role at FTX.

“Sam has made mistakes, but his life would be wasted in prison,” said Gabriel. “He has great gifts to offer the world.”

Read more

title: Unofficial GameStop memecoin's $4M token presale draws investor controversy
description:
The memecoin project wants to follow in the footsteps of the Wall Street Memes token, but it has allegedly yet to send coins to investors that have already paid.

GameStop Memes (GMS), an unofficia project which seeks to capitalize on the success of the similar Wall Street Memes (WSM) token, has raised $4 million from investors, according to a Feb. 14 post from the project’s official X account. But some investors allege it is a never-ending presale that siphons away investors’ crypto and gives them nothing in return.

An investor who spoke on condition of anonymity told Cointelegraph that he never received GMS tokens despite having spent $1,000 purchasing them via the project’s website. Instead, he allegedly was told by developers that the tokens would only be delivered once the ongoing presale ends. In addition, he stated that the developers refused to give him an exact date as to when the presale will end, telling him that it will only end when all of the tokens are sold. "the presale is ongoing and never ending," the investor claimed. 

In a conversation with Cointelegraph via Telegram, the GameStop development team confirmed that the tokens will not be sent to investors until after the presale is over. The team declined to state a definite ending date for the presale but did say that if the presale fails to sell out, “we have plans in place to match the amount of presale allocation.”

Read more

title: At $61,594 Bitcoin is at fair market price according to the power law model
description:
On a monumental day for Bitcoin, where it opened at $56,900, the flagship digital asset has officially exited the bear market according to the Bitcoin Power Law model. title: Bringing Two Worlds Together: Kinetex Announces ZK Light Client For Bitcoin
description: PRESS RELEASE. Kinetex is excited to introduce BTCX, a Bitcoin ZK light client built with Succinct Labs. Developed using Succinct’s plonky2x framework and deployed seamlessly through its unified proving stack, BTCX enables EVM-compatible networks to verify the Bitcoin state directly without any centralized actors in between. title: Analyst: XRP Triangle Formation Resurgence Echoes Past 66,000% Surge
